sentences.en: "Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs," the 1937 Disney classic, has lost none of its original charm.
sentences.cn: 迪斯尼1937年的经典之作《白雪公主和七个小矮人》从未丧失其最初的魅力。

sentences.en: A bit of charm and humour would not go amiss.
sentences.cn: 人有点吸引力和幽默感总是好的。

sentences.en: He could alternately bully and charm people.
sentences.cn: 他一会儿欺负人一会儿取悦人。

sentences.en: He had enormous charm and a great sense of humour.
sentences.cn: 他极富魅力而且非常有幽默感。

sentences.en: He had much charm and a winning personality.
sentences.cn: 他魅力十足，个性迷人。

sentences.en: He has good looks and charm, and always falls on his feet.
sentences.cn: 他长得很帅，也有魅力，总是走好运。

sentences.en: He radiates charm and chic.
sentences.cn: 他魅力四射，风度翩翩。

sentences.en: He was a man of great charm and not inconsiderable wit.
sentences.cn: 他是魅力十足、机智过人的男人。

sentences.en: Joe’s boyish charm
sentences.cn: 乔身上的稚趣

sentences.en: Johnson's easy charm contrasted sharply with the prickliness of his boss.
sentences.cn: 约翰逊的亲和力和他老板易怒的性格形成了鲜明的对比。

sentences.en: Many men are charm itself.
sentences.cn: 许多男人非常有魅力。

sentences.en: On other occasions she can be charm personified.
sentences.cn: 在其他场合，她是魅力的化身。

sentences.en: She collects anything that has charm.
sentences.cn: 她收集一切有特色的东西。

sentences.en: She had a gamine charm which men found irresistibly attractive.
sentences.cn: 她有一种男人们抗拒不了的顽皮可爱的魅力。

sentences.en: She is very good at using her charm to get her way.
sentences.cn: 她非常善于利用自己的魅力随心所欲。

sentences.en: She liked him above all for his effortless charm.
sentences.cn: 她最喜欢他身上那种与生俱来的魅力。

sentences.en: She turned on the charm (= used her charm ) to all the men.
sentences.cn: 她对所有那些男人都施展魅力。

sentences.en: The Elizabethan house oozes charm.
sentences.cn: 这幢伊丽莎白时期的房子散发着迷人的魅力。

sentences.en: The room had no windows and all the charm of a prison cell (= used to say that something has no charm ) .
sentences.cn: 这房间没有窗，简直就是牢房。

sentences.en: We were charmed by the friendliness of the local people.
sentences.cn: 我们被当地人的友好吸引住了。

words.tran_cn: 超凡魅力的；神赐能力的
迷住；对…行魔法；哄诱（charm的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 效验如神地；异常成功地

trans.tran_cn: 魅力，魔力，迷人的特征，符咒，(手镯或项链上的)
trans.tran_en: a special quality someone or something has that makes people like them, feel attracted to them, or be easily influenced by them – used to show approval

trans.tran_cn: 吸引力，可爱之处，迷人；行魔法
trans.tran_en: a special quality someone or something has that makes people like them, feel attracted to them, or be easily influenced by them – used to show approval
to attract someone and make them like you, sometimes in order to make them do something for you
to attract someone and make them like you, sometimes in order to make them do something for you
